start.txt_2: I am looking for a company that offers me the opportunity to develop as a professional in the field of programming, working on stimulating and enriching projects.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Why do they hire me?
about.description: Professional committed to excellence in my projects, providing recommendations of technologies and strategies appropriate to each specific case.

item_1.txt_2: Customized solutions to enhance your online presence. Modern and functional designs that adapt to varied projects, including online stores, with a focus on user experience, guaranteeing effectiveness and originality.

item_2.txt_2: My specialization is custom programming, which involves developing unique and effective software designed specifically to meet the individual needs of my clients.

item_3.txt_2: I specialize in the creation and management of databases, ensuring efficient storage and information security. My approach encompasses query optimization to ensure agile and reliable systems.

description.title: UTN
description.datails: I was part of a team of 10 people and assumed a main role in the development of the Frontend, in addition to actively collaborating in the design of the database. We implement agile methodologies to effectively manage the project. We addressed the problem of inefficiency in academic procedures, which were exclusively physical and in-person. We created 'Virtual Help Desk' by integrating three independent systems. For the Frontend, we use ReactJS, JavaScript, Tailwind, HTML and CSS. In the Backend, we use PHP and a MySQL database. The project resulted in a complete success, with a significant improvement in the efficiency of academic procedures.

description.title: UTN
description.datails: I led a team of 5 people in a project to modernize quality inspection in a footwear company. We manually automated a process that resulted in a significant improvement in inspection efficiency. On the Frontend, we use JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, HTML and Tailwind. On the Backend, we implemented Node.js and a MySQL database, along with templating engines like EJS and Handlebars. We use Axios to make HTTP requests to the server. Additionally, we conduct extensive testing with Jest to ensure the quality of the software. We follow agile methodologies, such as Scrum, for efficient collaboration.

description.title: UTN
description.datails: I faced a critical challenge with the Sysacad system. Student searches were slow due to lack of indexing in SQL queries, which slowed down the system. To solve this, I led the creation of an index on the key columns of the database, allowing the system to find data quickly, reducing the search time from 1 minute to 0.3 milliseconds. This improvement not only optimized the system, but also provided almost instant responses to users, transforming their experience. Indexing became an essential solution to solve the problem of slow student searches in Sysacad.

description.title: UTN
description.datails: I have successfully completed final projects in subjects such as Syntax, Paradigms, Algorithms, Web Design and Systems Design. Using languages like C/C++, Java, MySQL, and Arduino, I have excelled at creating a parser in Java, exploring sorting algorithms in C/C++, developing a game of Pong on Arduino, and working with advanced data structures like grammars, arrays , graphs, automata and regular expressions. During this stage, my passion for code optimization, the application of design patterns and good programming practices has been evident, which has contributed to ensuring quality and efficiency in my projects. Whenever there was a final project, I firmly set out to win.
